name: Kaguya White
uniques: Only available <when number of [turns] is greater than [5]>

civilopediaText.text: Pick an Ability Card of Your Choice

Ability Cards are used for giving your nation beneficial effects, each nation can only have one. This can be traded with other civlizations, but by itself doesn't provide happiness despite being a Luxury resource.
You can skip this and pick again later...
